cause.description:
Stripper's rights are being violated everyday. Freedom of expression is a cornerstone right of our society, and we are willing to fight for every young, beautyful, voluptouis college student's right to get naked for money. We are a nonprofit organization and promise that all your donations will go directly to our very caring mouths directly into their beautiful titties. STOP THE ENFORCEMENT OF PASTIES NOW!!!
1. Stripper's are human beings too
2. Stop the enforcement of pasties
3. Full nudity in every state
cause.mission: Fightin for young women everywhere, and supporting single mothers across the world.
cause.name: Stripper Relief Fund
